messages.subject: Sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: Anybody going to the HSC Conference in Sacramento this weekend?  I know Betsy, Pam S. and Pam H. are.  With me that s 3 Pams.  Anyone else?  And can we have an
messages.messageBody:
Anybody going to the HSC Conference in Sacramento this weekend? I know
Betsy, Pam S. and Pam H. are. With me that's 3 Pams. Anyone else? And can we
have an unschooling get together? Maybe past midnight......

Pam T.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... Drat. That s too close for me. I d need at little time to recover between travel dates. Oh well. Good luck, Pam! :o) Life is good. ~Mary The miracle is
messages.messageBody:
>>It is just one week from the dates of the SC conference. Is anyone but
>>Pam S. going to make the heroic effort to attend both?>>

Drat. That's too close for me. I'd need at little time to recover between
travel dates. Oh well. Good luck, Pam! :o)

Life is good.
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green
earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive."

~ Thich Nhat Hanh
